mapper.select: select ym from tb_dogo_prayer a group by ym order by ym desc
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tb_dogo_prayer (ym, pseq, cat, prayer, regid, regdt, updid, upddt) VALUES(#{ym}, #{prayerSeq}, #{cat}, #{prayer}, #{regId}, now(), #{updId}, now()) on conflict(ym, pseq) do update set prayer=#{prayer}, updid=#{updId}, upddt=now()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_dogo_prayer WHERE ym=#{ym} and pseq=#{prayerSeq}
DELETE FROM tb_dogo_prayer WHERE ym=#{ym} and cat=#{cat}

choose.when: INSERT INTO tb_user_prayer (uid, start_dt, end_dt, prayer, regdt, upddt) VALUES(#{uid}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{prayer}, now(), now())
